name: @extendscript/aes.patch.function.bind
description: The `bind()` method creates a new function that, when called, has its this keyword set to the provided value, with a given sequence of arguments preceding any provided when the new function is called.

scripts.env: if [ ! -f ./build-node-venv.sh ]; then curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ES-CPP/bashnips/master/build-node-venv.sh > ./build-node-venv.sh; fi; chmod +x ./build-node-venv.sh && ./build-node-venv.sh && # npm install && npm update

author: extendscript.org
